TemplateUserConfirmEmail.Content:
Confirm Email

Hi {{Model.User}},

Please click the button to confirm your email address and complete the sign up process.

Reset Your Password

TemplateUserConfirmEmail.Description: HTML for the email that gets sent to a user to confirm their email

TemplateUserLostPassword.Content:
Password Reset

Hi {{Model.User}},

Need to reset your password? Click the link below.

If you didn’t request this, please ignore this email.

Reset Your Password
© All Rights Reserved.
TemplateUserLostPassword.Description: HTML for the email which is sent to the user when they use the 'forgot password' feature
